website_summaries.verdict: Apple's most affordable iPod is a cheap, workout-friendly option for listening to music or podcasts, but it shows its age with a reliance on iTunes syncing and lack of wireless support.
pros: The Apple iPod Shuffle is affordably priced with a compact design and long-lasting battery
It's both stylish and easily wearable, thanks to its sturdy built-in clip
cons: Requires a USB sync from a PC or Mac running iTunes
Navigating your music is a bit difficult without a screen
You can't download subscription Apple Music songs

customer_reviews.title: I will never buy anything refurbished again
customer_reviews.text: The iPod didn't work, I was really disappointed. I returned it and I won't ever buy anything refurbished again.
customer_reviews.author: Terry L. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and charged and tried to download songs but it wouldn't do anythung.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Dead on arrival
customer_reviews.text: Dead on arrival. Will not charge+ tried in multiple USB ports, with multiple chargers, with multiple iPod shuffle cords.
customer_reviews.author: W Watson

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic item
customer_reviews.text: I had an ipod for many years that I use when I do all kinds of outdoor home maintenance work and it helped but then stopped working and found this one here and it's fantastic working well now. Since I'm a senior woman I am glad to have all my favorite musics taped on the ipod to help me work well and enjoy the music I was able to tape.
customer_reviews.author: MariaTia

customer_reviews.title: Bright color So I don’t lose this one
customer_reviews.text: It’s a real Apple iPod the smallest one it’s fantastic really. I like using this size for My workouts. I actually ordered this one in this color because it’s very bright and I won’t lose this one. I’ve had two little black ones before and they keep disappearing on me. I’ll find it and then I lose it again.
customer_reviews.author: Check out infowars

customer_reviews.title: Pocket sized product
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the gym or taking a walk. Set it in your pocket & you have music.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Cooney

customer_reviews.title: Awesome IPod Shuffle
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with my I Pod. I listen to it in my car and its great for long rides. Only think I don't like was they don't have the voiceover when they tell you the artist or song.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent and Clever Product
customer_reviews.text: I brought this for my granddaughter for her birthday. She loves it! What more could you ask?
customer_reviews.author: Prontopac

customer_reviews.title: I NEED MY CHECKING ACCOUNT CREDITED.
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't work. I sent it back weeks ago per the directions for a full refund. So far, nothing has been credited to my checking account.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great MP3 player
customer_reviews.text: I love the size it is so easy to use for exercise or just doing yard work. I love my shuffle.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy L

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I received the Shuffle when promised. Although it was refurbished, it looked new. I charged it up and loaded a Playlist on it and it works great. Very convenient. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Jenenne

customer_reviews.title: required for school trip
customer_reviews.text: This device is the best way fo rmy son to have music for long bus rides on school field trips without wifi or internet connection. He can't have any music if he has internet.
customer_reviews.author: Liz Burbank

customer_reviews.title: i Pod Shuffle
customer_reviews.text: Much lower volume than previous ones I've had. Sometimes difficult to hear with the earbuds
customer_reviews.author: John J. Sciambi

customer_reviews.title: not what I thought it was
customer_reviews.text: I didn't really dislike the item...It wasn't what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Wallace K. Crane

customer_reviews.title: Gym going friend
customer_reviews.text: Great size and holds all my tunes. The shuffle line is best for working out when you don't want a larger player to flop around.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Clarke

customer_reviews.title: Dud
customer_reviews.text: Used for one cycle and I have not been able to get it to charge or play. I-Miss my music
customer_reviews.author: Beth A. Howlett

customer_reviews.title: Never worked.
customer_reviews.text: Never worked and wouldn’t accept my return. Waste of money. Took advantage of the fact that Apple doesn’t sell any more.
customer_reviews.author: sdw

customer_reviews.title: MP3 players still rock!!
customer_reviews.text: My new MP3 player is everything I wanted. It is so easy to use and holds tons of songs and I thank you
customer_reviews.author: sheika

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: The battery is bad I’m this shuffle . I need a refund or new shuffle
customer_reviews.author: Christina G.

customer_reviews.title: I am extremely pleased with my I Pod Shuffle
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely pleased with my I Pod Shuffle. It was indicated as refurbished but looks brand new and functions quite well.
customer_reviews.author: james Wikstrom

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: This product was delivered fast and as advertised. The wife loves the color and how light it is, perfect for her daily walks
customer_reviews.author: Steven Grondin

customer_reviews.title: IPOD DIED
customer_reviews.text: rebuilt is risky but ipod is now ... dead. oh well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Present for my grandson for his birthday and he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love the product. I've had many of them. This last one i bought could not hold a charge.
customer_reviews.author: dave capodici

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Quit working, won't charge. Of course it was 5 days off being able to return it. ;-(
customer_reviews.author: William R. Langston

customer_reviews.title: Can't even use it
customer_reviews.text: It's not fun when items you order don't work. 2 stars only because it looks okay, but the cable does not work. Since it's almost Christmas I'd rather just go to the store and find one than wait for delivery of a new one. I'm hoping the shuffle works fine, but I won't find out till I buy another cable!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: As advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time, looks and works like new. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Sherman

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Only ran once and then did not want to grab battery, and now Is dead
customer_reviews.author: Roberto Dirani

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: I can't get the iPod to even work!! I am so disappointed that I can't just plug it into my computer and have my iTunes or computer acknowledge that its there. I have spent hours trying to get this to work.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Schoesler

customer_reviews.title: "Square Deals Inc." sold an empty ipod case for $45.
customer_reviews.text: I spent $45.00 on this item and received a box containing an ipod nano case with only a cheap pair of apple earbuds and a 3" usb plug with a headphone jack attached to it. The case was absent its ipod, as was the box. I was forced to seek a refund. I am very much dissatisfied, you feel me? yeah. no good. no good at all. In no way was this a "square deal"
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lovin my blue ipod shuffle
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with my ipod shuffle. This is my third one. I wore out my first two. Did not think they were available any more. So thrilled. Thank you for your great service.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Andorfer

product_meta.title: Apple iPod Shuffle 2GB Blue (4th Generation, 2015 Model) MKME2LL/A (Renewed)
feature_bullets: Renewed products look and work like new. These pre-owned products have been inspected and tested by Amazon-qualified suppliers, which typically perform a full diagnostic test, replacement of any defective parts, and a thorough cleaning process. Packaging and accessories may be generic. All products on Amazon Renewed come with a minimum 90-day supplier-backed warranty.
Durable and Lightweight Aluminum Body, Integrated Clip
